title: Brightest Star in the Sky
resume: Mee has a messed up past since her father doesn't want to take responsibility of her mother when her mother was pregnant at the age of 15, so she was raised by her aunt. Because of her aunt being so strict she ran off in order to find her mother in Northern part of Thailand, however her life there became miserable since she encounters an abusive stepfather who is involved in human trafficking, but her helpless mother couldn't stop her evil stepfather.
